---
title: "Phase 5: Delivery"
---

## What You Will Do
- Turn analysis into stories, decks, or reports for stakeholders
- Tailor insights to non-technical audiences
- Reflect on impact and next iterations

## Deliverables
- Slide deck or one-page brief with key findings
- Visuals packaged for sharing (PNG/PDF)
- Reflection on lessons learned and future work

## Milestones
- **Week 12:** Draft narrative outline
- **Week 13:** Slide/brief draft with visuals
- **Week 14:** Final presentation + retrospective

## Activities
- Translate stats into plain language takeaways
- Add a "So what?" section for each finding
- Rehearse with a peer and capture feedback in your journal

## Templates & Links
- Journal reflections: `99_Templates/Weekly_Journal_Template.md`
- Store decks/briefs in `03_Project/04_Drafts/`

## Next Steps
- Celebrate, then archive your project materials in the vault for future reference
